trans-unit.source: Provides an abstract class for specifying character data and formatting properties to be used by the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextFormatter"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Inneholder en abstrakt klasse for å angi tegndata og formatering egenskapene som skal brukes av den <xref href="System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextFormatter"> </xref> objektet.

trans-unit.source: All access to the text in the TextSource object is through the <xref:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextSource.GetTextRun%2A>, which is designed to allow the text layout client to virtualize text in any way it chooses.
trans-unit.target: All tilgang til tekst i TextSource-objektet er i <xref:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextSource.GetTextRun%2A>, som er utformet for at teksten oppsettet klienten "visualisere" tekst slik den velger.</xref:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextSource.GetTextRun%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextFormatter> is the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] text engine that provides services for formatting text and breaking text lines.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextFormatter>er det [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] motor som gir tjenester for tekstformatering og dele tekstlinjer.</xref:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextFormatter>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextFormatter> can handle different text character formats and paragraph styles, and includes support for international text layout.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextFormatter>kan håndtere forskjellige tekstformater for tegn og avsnittsstiler, og inkluderer støtte for internasjonale tekstoppsettet.</xref:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextFormatter>

trans-unit.source: Unlike a traditional text [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_api](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-api-md.md)], the <xref:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextFormatter> interacts with a text layout client through a set of callback methods.
trans-unit.target: I motsetning til en tradisjonell tekst [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_api](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-api-md.md)], <xref:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextFormatter>samhandler med en tekst oppsettet klient gjennom et sett med tilbakeringing-metoder.</xref:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextFormatter>

trans-unit.source: It requires the client to provide these methods in an implementation of the TextSource class.
trans-unit.target: Den krever klienten å oppgi disse metodene i implementering av TextSource-klassen.

trans-unit.source: The following list describes the three members you must override: - <xref:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextSource.GetTextRun%2A>: Retrieves a <xref:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextRun> starting at a specified TextSource position.
trans-unit.target: Listen nedenfor beskriver tre medlemmer må du overstyre:- <xref:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextSource.GetTextRun%2A>: henter en <xref:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextRun>med Start fra den angitte posisjonen for TextSource.</xref:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextRun> </xref:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextSource.GetTextRun%2A>

trans-unit.source: - <xref:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextSource.GetPrecedingText%2A>: Retrieves the text span immediately before the specified TextSource position.
trans-unit.target: - <xref:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextSource.GetPrecedingText%2A>: Henter tekst område umiddelbart før den angitte posisjonen for TextSource.</xref:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextSource.GetPrecedingText%2A>

trans-unit.source: - <xref:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextSource.GetTextEffectCharacterIndexFromTextSourceCharacterIndex%2A>: Retrieves a value that maps a TextSource character index to a <xref:System.Windows.Media.TextEffect> character index.
trans-unit.target: - <xref:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextSource.GetTextEffectCharacterIndexFromTextSourceCharacterIndex%2A>: Henter en verdi som tilordner en TextSource tegn indeks til en <xref:System.Windows.Media.TextEffect>tegnindeksen.</xref:System.Windows.Media.TextEffect> </xref:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextSource.GetTextEffectCharacterIndexFromTextSourceCharacterIndex%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > For a complete code sample that shows how to implement a derived TextSource class, see [Advanced Text Formatting Sample](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=159965) .
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > For en fullstendig kodeeksempel som viser hvordan du kan implementere avledede TextSource klassens, kan du se [Avansert tekst formatering utvalg](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=159965) .

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextSource"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextSource"> </xref> klasse.

trans-unit.source: Retrieves the text span immediately before the specified <xref href="System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextSource"></xref> position.
trans-unit.target: Henter tekst område umiddelbart før det angitte <xref href="System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextSource"> </xref> posisjon.

trans-unit.source: The GetPrecedingText method returns an empty <xref:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.CultureSpecificCharacterBufferRange> if the text span immediately before `textSourceCharacterIndexLimit` does not contain any text, such as inline object or a hidden run.
trans-unit.target: GetPrecedingText returneres en tom <xref:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.CultureSpecificCharacterBufferRange>Hvis teksten strekker seg over umiddelbart før `textSourceCharacterIndexLimit` ikke inneholder tekst, for eksempel linjebundet objekt eller en skjult Kjør.</xref:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.CultureSpecificCharacterBufferRange>

trans-unit.source: This method returns a zero-length text span if there are no values preceding `textSourceCharacterIndexLimit`.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden returnerer en tom tekst-område hvis det finnes ingen verdier som kommer foran `textSourceCharacterIndexLimit`.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Int32> value that specifies the character index position where text retrieval stops.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Int32>verdi som angir indeksen tegnposisjonen der teksten henting slutter.</xref:System.Int32>

trans-unit.source: A value that represents the text span immediately before textSourceCharacterIndexLimit.
trans-unit.target: En verdi som angir at teksten umiddelbart før textSourceCharacterIndexLimit .

trans-unit.source: Retrieves a value that maps a <xref href="System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextSource"></xref> character index to a <xref href="System.Windows.Media.TextEffect"></xref> character index.
trans-unit.target: Henter en verdi som tilordner en <xref href="System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextSource"> </xref> tegn indeks til en <xref href="System.Windows.Media.TextEffect"> </xref> tegnindeksen.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Int32> value that specifies the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextSource"></xref> character index to map.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Int32>verdi som angir den <xref href="System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextSource"> </xref> tegn indeks ikke tilordne.</xref:System.Int32>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Int32> value that represents the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.TextEffect"></xref> character index.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Int32>verdi som representerer den <xref href="System.Windows.Media.TextEffect"> </xref> tegnindeksen.</xref:System.Int32>

trans-unit.source: Retrieves a <xref href="System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextRun"></xref> starting at a specified <xref href="System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextSource"></xref> position.
trans-unit.target: Henter en <xref href="System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextRun"> </xref> Start ved en angitt <xref href="System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextSource"> </xref> posisjon.

trans-unit.source: A text run is a sequence of characters sharing a single property set.
trans-unit.target: En tekst som kjøres er en sekvens med tegn deling av et sett med én egenskap.

trans-unit.source: Any change to the format, such as font family, font style, foreground color, text decoration, or any other formatting effect, breaks the text run.
trans-unit.target: Endring format, for eksempel skriftfamilien, skriftstil, forgrunnsfargen, text-decoration eller noen andre formatering effekt sideskift teksten kjøres.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextRun> class is the root of a type hierarchy representing several types of text content processed by <xref:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextFormatter>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextRun>Klassen er roten av et hierarki for typen som representerer flere typer tekstinnhold som er behandlet av <xref:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextFormatter>.</xref:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextFormatter> </xref:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextRun>

trans-unit.source: Each class that is derived from <xref:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextRun> represents a distinct type of text content.
trans-unit.target: Hver klasse som er avledet fra <xref:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextRun>representerer en distinkte type tekstinnhold.</xref:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextRun>

trans-unit.source: |Class|Description| |-----------|-----------------| |<xref:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextRun>|Root of the hierarchy.
trans-unit.target: | Klassen | Beskrivelse | |-----------|-----------------| | <xref:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextRun>| Roten i hierarkiet.</xref:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextRun>

trans-unit.source: Defines a group of characters that share the same set of character properties.| |<xref:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextCharacters>|Defines a collection of character glyphs from a distinct physical typeface.| |<xref:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextEmbeddedObject>|Defines a type of text content in which measuring, hit testing, and drawing of the entire content is done as a distinct entity.
trans-unit.target: Definerer en gruppe tegn som deler det samme settet med tegnegenskaper for. | | <xref:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextCharacters>| Definerer en samling med tegnet tegn fra en distinkte fysisk skrift. | | <xref:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextEmbeddedObject>| Definerer en type tekst innhold i som måle treffprosent testing og tegning av hele innholdet utføres som en distinkte enhet.</xref:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextEmbeddedObject> </xref:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextCharacters>

trans-unit.source: An example of this type of content is a button in the middle of the line of text.| |<xref:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextEndOfLine>|Defines a line-break character code.| |<xref:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextEndOfParagraph>|Defines a paragraph-break character code.
trans-unit.target: Et eksempel på denne typen innhold er en knappen midt i tekstlinje. | | <xref:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextEndOfLine>| Definerer en linjeskift tegnkode. | | <xref:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextEndOfParagraph>| Definerer en avsnitt-break-tegnkode.</xref:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextEndOfParagraph> </xref:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextEndOfLine>

trans-unit.source: Derives from <xref:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextEndOfLine>.| |<xref:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextEndOfSegment>|Defines a segment break marker.| |<xref:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextHidden>|Defines a range of non-visible characters.| |<xref:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextModifier>|Defines the beginning of a modification scope.|
trans-unit.target: Er avledet fra <xref:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextEndOfLine>. | | <xref:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextEndOfSegment>| Definerer et segment break-merke. | | <xref:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextHidden>| Definerer en rekke usynlige tegn. | | <xref:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextModifier>| Definerer begynnelsen av en endring omfang. |</xref:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextModifier> </xref:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextHidden> </xref:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextEndOfSegment> </xref:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextEndOfLine>

trans-unit.source: Specifies the character index position in the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextSource"></xref> where the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextRun"></xref> is retrieved.
trans-unit.target: Angir tegnposisjonen for indeksen i den <xref href="System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextSource"> </xref> der den <xref href="System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextRun"> </xref> hentes.

trans-unit.source: A value that represents a <xref href="System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextRun"></xref>, or an object derived from <xref href="System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextRun"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: En verdi som representerer en <xref href="System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextRun"> </xref>, eller et objekt som er avledet fra <xref href="System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextRun"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Get or sets the PixelsPerDip at which the text should be rendered.
trans-unit.target: Får eller angir PixelsPerDip teksten skal gjengis.

trans-unit.source: Any class that extends <xref:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextSource> should update PixelsPerDip whenever the DPI changes for a Per Monitor DPI Aware application.
trans-unit.target: Klassen som utvider <xref:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextSource>må oppdatere PixelsPerDip når PPT endres for en Per overvåkingen PPT bevisste applikasjon.</xref:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextSource>

trans-unit.source: The current PixelsPerDip value.
trans-unit.target: Gjeldende PixelsPerDip verdi.
